text: Is this possible to include apr-iconv in source distributive of Apache?
creator: zm_main@tut.by

text:
Yes. It will be in the Win32 source distribution as of 2.0.45.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Actually, since 2.0.44 - quit downloading .tar.gz when we suggest, point blank,
  that -winnt-src.zip was prepared for Win32 builders.
